prompt.p: Lymphoid tissue is found throughout the body, and acts to protect the body against foreign antigens.

modalFeedback.p:
Option C (Spleen) is Correct. Spleen is not lymphoid tissue. Lymphoid tissues in the body include the tonsils, the thymus gland, the mediastinum and the lymph nodes.
Option A (Lymph nodes) is Incorrect. Lymph nodes are lymphoid tissue.
Option B (Mediastinum) is Incorrect. The mediastinum is lymphoid tissue.
Option D (Thymus) is Incorrect. The thymus is lymphoid tissue.
Option E (Tonsils) is Incorrect. The tonsils are lymphoid tissue.
